transcript:
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji Rishabh Stone Crusher se baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji sir Rishabh baat kar raha tha, senior manager India Mart office se kaise hain?
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Badhiya.
Executive: Badhiya hain sir apni company chal rahi thi Rishabh Stone Crusher ke naam se kuch services mein issues aa rahe hain sir mere pass Anirudh aaya hua tha aapki baat hui hogi na services mein to aapne band karne ke liye bola hua hai sir kya dikkat aa rahi hai isme?
Customer: Sir dekho jo hamara material hai na wo agar hum apne Uttarakhand ke bahar bhejenge na to usme utna hi rate lagega aur phir uh hamare jo rate rate badh jayenge hamara koi mar se kharidne ka nahi.
Customer: Uttarakhand mein itni lead nahi aati.
Customer: Aur dusri baat hai.
Customer: Uttarakhand mein itna wo nahi hai rate matlab jo lead aave hamare pass itni aur jinse humne ab tak ke baat ki hai na India Mart se jo bhi lead aayi hai.
Customer: Un unse jitni jitni bhi humne baat kiya sabne ye kaha hai ki hum humne koi lead nahi kari.
Customer: Humne koi lead nahi dali.
Customer: Aur bahut hi matlab gusse wala behavior kar kar ke phone katte hain wo.
Executive: Sir kisi ke humne humne koi ho sakta hai main samajh sakta hu thik hai case to case wo aap mujhe ek bar share kar dena main check karwa lunga agar aisa koi problem hai lekin sir aisa nahi hai ki jitni leads aa rahi hai sare customer is tarike se baat karte hain kyuki maine dekha sir kuch leads aapne uthai hai kuch customer ne aapne baat bhi kari hai sir maine khud ne baat ki hai sir.
Customer: Maine khud ne baat ki hai sir unhone same bahut hi jaisa behavior karte hain na ki humne to koi lead dali nahi hai is tarah kar ke bolte hain na dobara phone mat karna is tarah kar kar ke kai janon ne mujhe phone maine khud ne baatein kai dafe ho rakha hai sir is tarah hi aur sir ab Uttarakhand ke bahar mal bhi bhejenge hum koi bada order hoga to ek bar to hum usse sochenge ji hum uski lead contact bhi kar lete hain us buyer se India ke wo matlab Uttarakhand ke bahar ab ut bhej bhi de mal agar jo budget usme profit ho sir ab itna koi wo to hai nahi sir ke Uttarakhand ke bahar mal kharid raha wo wahin se hi kharid lega kyuki rate tak se bachega.
Executive: Wo to hai hi sir main samajh sakta hu aap kya kehna chah rahe hain.
Customer: Ab maine ye hume jis jisne profile banayi thi hamari usne hamare se ye sab chije baat nahi share kari sir.
Customer: Aur ab to is tarah ho rakha hai na to is Anuj hai wo jinhone hamara account khola tha jo jinko humne check diya tha unhone kaha ke main aake dekhunga pichle.
Executive: Nahi dekhne ke liye to sir yaha pe Anirudh baitha hai koi dikkat hai aap Anirudh ko batao wo sahi kar ke dega main ek bar usse bolta hu sari chije jo bhi problem agar waisi aa rahi hai koi.
Customer: Anuj jinko humne check diya tha un unhone hume 15 din se bewkuf bana rakha hai sir ki main visit karunga office bataunga sir jab service live ho jati hai na service jab host ho jati hai na sir jab service start ho jati hai uske baad sara kuch sir yahin head office se hi dekha jata hai aapke liye Anirudh baitha hai Anirudh ki manager baithi hai nahi to main baitha hu aap puch sakte hain ki koi dikkat hai koi changes karwane hai kuch update karwana hai uske liye sir team yaha pe baithi hai sab yahin se dekha jata hai video call pe aaram se baith ke aap baat kar sakte ho koi dikkat nahi hai.
Customer: Sir sir hamara hum hum to nahi kar payenge sir phir India Mart pe kam.
Executive: Kyu sir aisa kyu?
Customer: Sir hamara budget dekho jitni lead milti hai na Uttarakhand mein aap khud check kar lo uh to beech beech mein sir Uttarakhand ki lead to sir aa rahi hai aisa nahi hai Haridwar ki lead Haridwar ki lead piche aapne bhi do teen din pehle.
Customer: Haridwar ki leads bhi aa rahi hai sir apne pass Dehradun ki bhi aa rahi hai ab tak ke main aapne aapne humne jit jitne ab tak ke hume India Mart se ek bhi order nahi mila sir.
Executive: Sir order to dekhiye main aapko batau service abhi apni host hui hai iska matlab sir humne ek sawa mahina hua hai dedh mahina hua hai main bilkul manta hu aapki baat par sir aap bhi samajh sakte ho aap business lene aaye ho sir business mein thoda samay to lag sakta hai aisa nahi hai sir ki koi nahi aayi to wo nahi aayegi.
Customer: Meri baat sune sir dekho aap jo keh rahe ho na lead ki baat to sir ye hai hamare jo product hai na sir ek to hai brick aur hai stone ke items rate badh rahe mujhe ab isme ab isme jo lead dal rahe hain na sir cement ki dal rahe hain Ultratech cement ki jo hamare sahi nahi item unki lead hum kyu le?
Executive: Nahi wo construction wali ek category se sir aapne kuch lead utha li hai ek category hai construction ki construction construction ki category service mein isme aapne service mein construction commercial building construction aapne uthai hai un vajah se bhi sir kabhi kabhi ho jata hai ki construction ka kam karte to cement wagera ki lead ek bar aa rahi hai wo main sir band kara dunga uski koi dikkat nahi hai usko aap not relevant mark kar do.
Customer: Not relevant kiya sir isme hmm.
Executive: Sir us jo lead galat aa rahi hai na us lead pe aap marking sahi kar do usme samne not relevant mark karne ka option aata hai aap us not relevant mein mark kar do wrong product usme option aata hai wrong product wrong quantity long location to aap wrong product mark kar dena sir wo automatic block ho jayegi wo koi dikkat nahi hai dekho jo chije sir galat aa rahi hai wo chije kam ho jayengi almost koi dikkat nahi hai sir.
Customer: Meri meri baat sune sir dedh do mahine do mahina hone ko aa rahe hain hum India Mart se ab tak koi profit nahi hua jabki jinhone humse check liya tha na jinhone hamara profile update kiya tha unhone kaha tha ke agar jo hum in matlab hamara business upar nahi jata to hum aap refund kar denge.
Executive: Sir sir bilkul aap bologe main band kar ke refund kara dunga refund karne ke liye main mana nahi kar raha sir jitna pro rata basis pe chala hai utna hi katega baki main refund kara dunga koi dikkat nahi hai but refund karna kyu hai sir aap but service business lene aaye hain sir business lijiye service ko chalaiye use kariye aaj nahi kal sir business to nikal hi jayega aapko bhi pata hai thik hai main samajhta hu kam aa rahi hai Haridwar ki Uttarakhand ki lekin aisa nahi hai sir lead nahi aa rahi hai.
Customer: Uttarakhand mal bhi bhejenge na Uttarakhand
Executive: Uttarakhand ke andar andar bhi Uttarakhand ke andar andar bhi sir apne pass Haridwar Rishikesh Rudki Dehradun leads aa rahi hai sir beech beech mein aur aap le bhi rahe hain ek mahine mein sir achi aa rahi hai do ya teen lead se do ya teen lead aati hai usme bhi sir hum unse contact 19 tarikh ko hi aapne teen char lead uthai hai Uttarakhand ki ek din mein do do teen teen lead uth ja rahi hai kai bar.
Executive: To sir offline mein bhi sir dekho itna investment hota hai sir tab aap itna wait karte ho ye to online hai sir chota investment hai.
Customer: India Mart se kya lead lead uthane se to nahi kuch ho raha na batao lead lead aapne lead ko khane ke baad baat karna hai quotation bhejna hai final hoga time lagta hai quotation har chije hoti hai sir lekin jab koi agla malik se keh deta hai na ki maine to lead di hi nahi.
Executive: Acha ha.
Customer: Maine to inquiry dali nahi hai ye keh dete hain wo saaf.
Executive: Acha.
Customer: To unka kya kare aap ek bar lead bhej aap ek bar lead bhej dena sir agar bahut jyada problem hai main lead to lead ek bar check karwa dunga jo valid hogi particular lekin sir aap bhi jante ho online portal hai 100% relevancy to possible nahi hai thoda bahut to sir beech beech mein is tarike se customer mil sakta hai aapko kyuki usne yaha lead dali hai kahin aur bhi dali hogi ya ho sakta hai galti se click kar ke dal di ho usme do bar option aata hai mobile number dal ke.
Customer: Meri baat sune sir main meri baat sune jo inquiry dalte hain nahi ye sirf rate confirm karne ke liye dalte hain sir jyadatar India Mart sare log nahi dalte agar sare log rate hi confirm kar rahe hote sir to aap ek bar apni inquiry dal ke dekhna sir ye aur kuch nahi hai sir sare log aise nahi hote kuch customer main samajh sakta hu dikkat aati hogi sir aisa nahi hai 100% customer bahut sara customer aisa bhi hai sir jo requirement date dal raha hai quotation de raha hai mal bhi le raha hai aise thodi sir India Mart chal raha hai hum log chal rahe hain.
Executive: Genuine customer bhi aa rahe honge sir aap ek bar dal ke dekho apna jo jo hamare product hai wo nahi hai sir jo India Mart pe sale karne ke liye sir ye hai condition hamari.
Executive: Sir aapne man banaya hua hai agar ek dam hi negative aap sochne ke sath to aapko negative man nahi hai sir aap thoda sa positive sochiye sir aap meri baat sune sir aap aap koi bhi agar ret bajri aap apne hi shahar mein lena chahenge to aap aap offline hi dekhenge jyadatar online nahi check kar lenge sir is chij ko aap jo hamare product hai sir kyuki online online aapko aap inquiry dal denge lekin aapko lekin wo wo baat nahi milenge aapko jo offline mein mil jayenge rate discuss bhi ho jayenge aur aapko sahi rate mil jayenge offline mein sir.
Customer: Ye aap khud khud bhi dekh sakte ho sir is chij ko aap.
Executive: Nahi wo chij thik hai sir aap main samajhta hu.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan haan aawaz aa rahi hai sir aawaz aa rahi hai.
Customer: To ye jo hamare product hai ye aise nahi hai ki hum agar aap ye dekho agar aapko kahin sasti chij mil rahi hai aapko apne hi shahar mein aap dusre shahar mein kyu jaoge ye batao na sir mahange len wo ye chij hoti hai sir ab unhone kaha tha ke hum jyadatar Uttarakhand ke denge aur Haridwar se hi lagta hua denge lead.
Customer: Ab unse baat bhi kari hai sir wo sirf inquiry mein rate discuss karte hain rate bhi nahi balki nahi keh dete humne to inquiry dali nahi hai India Mart pe sir.
Customer: Pareshan hai sir isiliye to humne aap nahi to humne hume kya aisa nahi hai sir hamara hamara jo humne check de rakha hai hum itna wo nahi kar sakte sir aisa nahi hai sir hum pata nahi isme to hum self manager rakh lete hain sir uski salary balki us self manager samajh gaya sir main lekin dekhiye aap bahut hard and fast decision le rahe hain sir bahut jaldi mein aisa nahi hai sir dekhiye kisi bhi chij mein business mein na sir thoda samay lagta hai.
Customer: Hard and fast nahi hai sir hard and fast nahi hai sir isme hamare product aise nahi hai jo hum ek dedh mahine ke observation pe sir band karana koi matlab wo nahi hai ki aage business nahi milega right baki sir jaisa aap chahe matlab main aapko mana nahi kar raha hmm hmm.
Customer: Hmm aap refund kara dena sir isse jyada nahi sir.
Executive: Chaliye thik hai sir main dalta hu aage karwata hu process.
Customer: Thik hai sir.
Executive: Main ek do din ke andar do din ke andar aapka band kara ke aur jo bhi hoga apna refund ka calculation aapko bata dega aur process karwa dunga koi dikkat nahi hai.
Customer: Thik hai sir.
Executive: Thik hai koi dikkat wali baat nahi main koshish karta hu kal tak sir band ho jaye apna taki aapka kam se kam thik hai.
Customer: Thik hai sir.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul thik hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting enough leads. 

- Leads are irrelevant to their products.

- Some customers deny placing inquiries on IndiaMART.

- Dissatisfied with the services.

- Wants refund if business doesn't improve.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to check lead quality.

- Executive explained how to mark wrong leads.

- Executive agreed to process the refund.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will initiate the refund process.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, subscription, relevancy, leads
